section.title: Hyperbolic Geometry
section.p: Hyperbolic geometry results by replacing the Euclidean parallel postulate with the following.

statement.p: Given a line and a point not on that line there exists at least two lines through the point and parallel to the lines.

exercise.p: There were three major variants (wordings) of the Euclidean parallel postulate. Conjecture what these look like in hyperbolic geometry.
